data.name: Coven
data.detailed_description:
Coven is a fast-paced retro fps/slasher which is heavily inspired by classic fps games such as Blood, Hexen, Unreal and Timesplitters.

In the first episode you take on the role of a young girl in the 1600's who is wrongly accused of witchcraft and is burned at the stake. She's resurrected by an unknown force and seeks revenge.

In the first episode:
- Utilize an explosive mix of early modern period weaponry and magic
- Movement is key - dash, slide, teleport and slow down time in order to survive
- Eat the flesh of the newly deceased to regain health so you may continue on your path of rigorous vengeance
- Explore villages, temples, forests and cities to uncover the secrets of the old gods
- Slammin' tunes by John S. Weekley aka Primeval

More episodes will release during early access. Each set in a unique time period.

data.short_description: Coven is a hyper violent, fast-paced fps which is heavily inspired by classic fps games such as Blood, Hexen, Unreal and Timesplitters. Destroy your enemies and eat their flesh.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NA
  • Additional Notes: For 1080p 60fps (I only have these 2 builds to test on)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 8600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NA
  • Additional Notes: For 1440p 144fps (I only have these 2 builds to test on)

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of explicit violence and gore. Contains scenes of torture, cannibalism and mutilation.
